response.original_title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Two
response.overview: Join the rarely seen Heroes of the Australia Bush, in their dangerous harvest of savage feral bulls.  Story ONE: As young teenagers, the Holroyd River Ringer Sisters have witnessed their father being gored twice by wild bulls. See how they survive in a tough world that would be alien to most men.  Story TWO: Come and explore the mysteries and wild bounty that surround the Poison Lagoon  Story THREE: See how a small band of bush ringers are able to capture the largest and fastest feral bulls around the Hidden Lagoon
response.title: How Much Bull Can You Take - Part Two
